mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sdmc from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_cqhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc}
SELECT zgy1,zgy2,zgy3 from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_cqhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and sdmc=#{sdmc}
SELECT zh from jjg_fbgc_sdgc_cqhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and sdmc=#{sdmc}
